class.name: VirtualTouchPad
class.brief_description: A control for relative touch movement, ideal for camera control.
class.description: [VirtualTouchPad] is a specialized control for tracking relative movement (deltas). It behaves similarly to a laptop trackpad or a mouse. [b]Architecture Note (Pure Motion):[/b] This node is strictly designed for [b]Continuous Motion[/b] (e.g., controlling a 3D camera, aiming a weapon). It emits [InputEventVirtualMotion] based on the relative movement of the finger between frames.
